import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { PRODUCTS } from '../products'; function Create() { const [values, setValues ] = useState({ name: '', price: '', description: '', type: '', image: '', }) const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit =(e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:8081/food', values) .then(res =>{ console.log(res); navigate('/') }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (

setValues({...values, name: e.target.value})}/>
setValues({...values, price: e.target.value})}/>
setValues({...values, description: e.target.value})}/>
setValues({...values, image: e.target.value})}/>
) } export default Create;
